09-12-2024: - Fixed issues with {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives hitting targets behind walls
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slice and Dice|Size=20} Slice and Dice damage reduced from 125 to 105
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting Deferred Damage Cleared reduced from 50% to 40%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow Bonus Damage from Full Rage reduced from +25% to +20%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow T2 now also increases Rage Amp by +5%
08-29-2024: - Bullet damage growth per boon reduced from 0.5 to 0.4
- Health growth per boon reduced from +41 to +35
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slice and Dice|Size=20} Slice and Dice T2 reduced from +100 to +85
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slice and Dice|Size=20} Slice and Dice T3 now considers creeps for only half value
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting deferred damage reduced from 35% to 30%
- The targeting UI for Shiv's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow is now more clear about when the target will be killed
08-22-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting incoming damage deferred reduced from 40% to 35%
08-16-2024: - Gun base damage reduced from 6.3 to 5.7
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives collision size reduced by 10%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives projectile speed reduced by 10%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives base damage reduced from 75 to 35
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives spirit scaling reduced from 1 to 0.6
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives DPS spirit scaling reduced from 0.2 to 0.16
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives T3 reduced from +75 Damage and +5 Bleed to +40 Damage and +5 Bleed
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Serrated Knives|Size=20} Serrated Knives bouncing to other units even if it did not impact the target
- Fixed Rage and {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting not clearing out on death
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bloodletting|Size=20} Bloodletting deferred damage waking him up from sleep
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Killing Blow|Size=20} Killing Blow falling through the world sometimes
